## Vector3.Dot() method

Returns the dot product (float) between the vectors "left" and "right"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Dot(left: ReadOnlyVector3, right: ReadOnlyVector3): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  left | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the left operand |
|  right | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the right operand |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the dot product
